ASML Holding (ASML) stock is moving higher as it reached a $500 billion market capitalization. Reddit (RDDT) stock is under pressure after the company received mixed feedback from RBC analysts. Verizon (VZ) is offering a $20 credit to customers who were affected by Wednesday's widespread outage. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: California set to approve Verizon acquisition of Frontier
summary: Jan 15 (Reuters) - The California Public Utilities Commission is set on Thursday to approve Verizon Communications's (VZ.N) $20 billion deal to acquire fiber-optic internet providers Frontier

headline: California approves Verizon acquisition of Frontier, clearing way for closing
summary: The California Public Utilities Commission on Thursday approved Verizon Communications'  $20 billion deal to acquire fiber-optic internet providers Frontier Communications , clearing the way for ​the deal to close on Tuesday after Verizon agreed to a series of conditions.  California ‌state regulators said Verizon committed to investing in 75,000 new fiber locations and building 25 new wireless towers to expand ‌service in rural areas in the state.  “The path to closing the Frontier acquisition marks ⁠a significant milestone in Verizon's ‌evolution and is a bold step forward in Verizon's transformation to regain market leadership,” said Verizon CEO Dan Schulman.

headline: Massive Corporate Layoffs Changed Everything, Says Robert Kiyosaki. Calls Going To School For Job Security An 'Obsolete Idea'
summary: Robert Kiyosaki says the recent wave of corporate job cuts shows that the traditional promise of stability through schooling no longer holds up in today's economy. In a recent post on X, the investor and author of “Rich Dad Poor Dad” argued that going to school for job security has become an “obsolete idea,” especially as layoffs hit industries that once symbolized safety, prestige, and high pay. headline: Verizon Issues $20 Credits to Customers Affected by Outage
summary: “Yesterday, we did not meet the standard of excellence our customers expect and that we expect of ourselves,” Verizon said in a statement Thursday morning.  The company is offering $20 account credits, which should cover “multiple days of service.”  People began noticing service disruptions shortly before noon in New York, according to Downdetector.
